content:
services:
  website:
    image: nginx:alpine
    restart: always
    entrypoint: ["/bin/sh", "-c", "apk add --no-cache wget && wget -qO- https://github.com/Jouiet/3a-automations/archive/main.tar.gz | tar xz -C /tmp && cp -r /tmp/3a-automations-main/landing-page-hostinger/* /usr/share/nginx/html/ && rm -rf /tmp/3a-automations-main && nginx -g 'daemon off;'"]
    labels:
      - traefik.enable=true
      - traefik.http.routers.website.rule=Host(`3a-automation.com`) || Host(`www.3a-automation.com`)
      - traefik.http.routers.website.tls=true
      - traefik.http.routers.website.entrypoints=web,websecure
      - traefik.http.routers.website.tls.certresolver=mytlschallenge
      - traefik.http.services.website.loadbalancer.server.port=80
    networks:
      - traefik_network

networks:
  traefik_network:
    external: true
    name: root_default
